docs.text:

feat: ✨ create plugin by ekishouTV · Pull Request #1 · ekishouTV/mkdocs-rendering-obsidian-auto-card-link For the moment, a card link is displayed without a css and it overwrite other markdown elements.Next, I add a css and change overwriting only a card link code block. github.com

The above PR.
